title: Stage Lv6-P1-S05
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I have completed many projects, but yesterday's presentation was the most challenging.
She has worked in various companies, and last year she decided to start her own business.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 나는 많은 프로젝트를 완료해 왔지만, 어제 발표는 가장 도전적이었다.
sentences.en: I have completed many projects, but yesterday's presentation was the most challenging.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 다양한 회사에서 일해왔고, 작년에 자신의 사업을 시작하기로 결심했다.
sentences.en: She has worked in various companies, and last year she decided to start her own business.

sentences.kr: 우리는 이 문제를 여러 차례 논의해왔고, 이전 회의에서 결론에 도달했다.
sentences.en: We have discussed this issue several times, and in the previous meeting we reached a conclusion.

sentences.kr: 회사는 지속적으로 성장해왔지만, 2020년에 어려운 시기를 겪었다.
sentences.en: The company has grown consistently, but it faced difficult times in 2020.

sentences.kr: 그는 많은 상을 받아왔고, 지난 주에 또 다른 인정을 받았다.
sentences.en: He has won many awards, and last week he received another recognition.

sentences.kr: 팀은 여러 차례 이 전략을 시도해보지 않았지만, 어제 처음으로 시도했다.
sentences.en: The team hasn't tried this strategy several times, but yesterday they attempted it for the first time.

sentences.kr: 기술이 빠르게 발전해왔고, 지난달 우리는 새로운 시스템을 도입했다.
sentences.en: Technology has advanced rapidly, and last month we introduced a new system.

sentences.kr: 시장 상황이 계속 변화해왔으며, 어제 발표된 새로운 규제가 영향을 미칠 것이다.
sentences.en: Market conditions have been changing continuously, and new regulations announced yesterday will have an impact.
